about.details:
Incorporated in 2008, Organic Recycling Systems Limited is an engineering company offering sustainable waste management solutions.

Organic Recycling Systems's business verticals include the Build Own Operate Transfer (BOOT) model, the Engineering Procurement and Commissioning (EPC) model and the Supply of Key Equipment. The company offers services such as EPC (Engineering, Procurement, and Construction) services in waste management, commissioning services, consulting and advisory services in the waste management sector, planning, building, and managing waste management projects, laboratory services and more.

Organic Recycling Systems (ORS) also set up an MSW processing and disposal plant in Solapur, Maharashtra to convert Municipal Solid Waste (MSW) into electricity and compost.

ORS has developed a patented DRY ANAEROBIC DIGESTION (DRYAD) technology which is capable of treating several kinds of waste and the same is also proven through its use in the Solapur plant.

Competitive Strength:

Proven Technology and capability.

Penetration into Multiple Business Verticals.

Lucrative Prospects of the Market.

UN Sustainability Development Goals.

Experience of the Promoters and Management personnel.

faqs.question: What is the Organic Recycling Systems IPO?
faqs.answer:
Organic Recycling Systems IPO is a SME IPO of 2500200 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹50.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹200 per share. The minimum order quantity is 600.

The IPO opens on September 21, 2023, and closes on September 26, 2023.

Maashitla Securities Private Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Organic Recycling Systems IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Organic Recycling Systems IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Organic Recycling Systems IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Organic Recycling Systems IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Organic Recycling Systems IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Organic Recycling Systems IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Organic Recycling Systems IPO opens on September 21, 2023 and closes on September 26, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Organic Recycling Systems IPO?
faqs.answer: Organic Recycling Systems IPO lot size is 600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Organic Recycling Systems IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Organic Recycling Systems IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Organic Recycling Systems IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Organic Recycling Systems IPO will be done on Friday, September 29, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, October 4, 2023. Check the Organic Recycling Systems IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Organic Recycling Systems IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Organic Recycling Systems IPO listing date is on Friday, October 6, 2023.
